entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
